div.h2: One Town. One School. One Family.

div.div: 104 N. New Street, PO Box 6, Ashley, MI 48806

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

a.title: Notice of Special School Board Meeting 9-6-19

br.span: The April 20, 2020, Board of Education Meeting has been canceled and will be rescheduled for a date to be determined.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background: aqua; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

br.span: Dear Families, In the upcoming weeks, you may receive a survey from Wayne State University about your experiences with special education. Wayne State University is working with the Michigan Department of Education to help find out families’ views about special education services and your responses may help improve services for families across Michigan. It is important for families to return the parent survey. The survey will come with instructions on how to access the survey online, as well. Thank you for helping us to collect this important information.
If you are interested in running for a seat on the Ashley Board of Education, please contact the Gratiot County Clerk at 875-5215

DUE TO STATE MANDATE, ASHLEY SCHOOLS WILL
BE CLOSED FOR THE REMAINDER OF THIS SCHOOL YEAR.
FOR MORE INFORMATION,
CLICK HERE.

br.a: Interested in ordering your 2019-2020 yearbook? Click Here

em.span: (If you would like to purchase a yearbook for the 2018-2019 school year, please see Ms. Flowers.)
